DOC.brief_summary: In this study we introduce and evaluate the feasibility of our surgical technique to hide the external scar of neck dissection using the robotic system via a modified facelift or retroauricular approach.
DOC.brief_title: Robot Assisted Supraomohyoid Neck Dissection Via Retroauricular Approach
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed as squamous cell carcinoma of the oral cavity no clinically identified cervical lymph node metastasis surgery as initial treatment suspicious neck metastasis radiation or chemotherapy before the surgery past history of neck surgery
